text:
<https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bradlc.vscode-tailwindcss>

if anyone is having issues getting VSCode Tailwind Intellisense working with HubSpot VSCode extension, these settings finally worked for me
`.vscode/settings.json` or your user preferences JSON ->
```{
  "files.associations": {
    "*.css": "css-hubl",
    "*.html": "html-hubl"
  },
  "tailwindCSS.includeLanguages": {
    "html-hubl": "html",
    "css-hubl": "css"
  }
}```
then you get this nice intellisense for tailwind^

Hi there!
IÂ´m trying to create a rule to send an email by workflows, but I only have the opportunity to send it for all the contacts.
I would like to send only to a specific ticket property.
Has anyone tried (or done) this before?
this looks like you're enrolling a deal or company and not a contact - is that right?
